title: Martyr
name: Anastasia
summary: The Martyr, is a devout follower of a pain-worshipping sect. Guarded by Yuzupov, she has near-immortality and uses a thorn whip in combat. Her presence is both an asset and liability, enduring suffering to protect others while seeking danger for her faith.
history: The Martyr's extreme devotion caught Yuzupov's attention, granting her near-immortality. She now views the estate's horrors as a pilgrimage to test her faith and endurance.

status.description: In good health and high spirits

clothing.top: Frilly red dress with ruffled white collar

notes: Constantly seeks out pain and dangerous situations
Finds pleasure in cutting, entangling, and strangling herself with her thorn whip
